attributes.action: stop cutting services we need more not less
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like the prime minster to sort out that there are enough services in the community and in hosptals to cope with all people that have mental health problems, As they are being cut left right and centre at the moment by all.  To save money, but you have enough money to go to war why not enough money for services for the mentally ill.  The discrimination is mostly  by people that are paid to help not the normal joe public as is said , would be nice of you could look in to that thankyou

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
